sections.heading: Learning Opportunity Grant Program; established
sections.text: The department shall establish and administer the Expanded Learning Opportunity Grant Program. The grant program shall provide grants to community-based organizations working in partnership with schools in high-need school districts to provide expanded

79-2504.Expanded Learning Opportunity Grant Program; established.

The department shall establish and administer the Expanded Learning Opportunity Grant Program. The grant program shall provide grants to community-based organizations working in partnership with schools in high-need school districts to provide expanded learning opportunity programs.

SourceLaws 2015, LB519, ยง 18.
